name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 4pm on May 8, an explosion was heard at Nishiarai Station in Adachi District, Tokyo, Japan. A can-shaped object broke apart, injuring two people and a Chinese man in his 40s was arrested. The arrested man confessed that he did not intentionally cause the explosion, claiming that the liquid in the can was a cleaning agent from the workplace, which he brought back to his residence for use. The police suspected that the chemical reaction between the cleaning agent and the materials in the coffee can may have caused the explosion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Guangdong University of Foreign Studies Nanguo Business School, when reporting graduation information, you must select "Has a signed labor contract"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 8, People's Daily Online published an article
Due to serious ecological problems such as pornography and vulgarity, the working group of the Internet Information Office entered the Douyu platform to carry out a one-month centralized rectification and supervision.
It is reported that Douyu Live is currently the live broadcast platform with the largest traffic in China, with 300 million registered users and an average of 174 million active users per month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The school made additional explanations later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, it was reported online that a villager in Shanxi killed the village chief and his family who framed him after he was released from prison.
According to the official report, at about 15:00 on May 1, 2023, a major criminal case occurred in Xishe Village, Hongdao Town, Dingxiang County, and the suspect Xu Mouqiang fled after committing the crime. After the incident, the provincial, municipal and county public security organs quickly set up a special team for homicide investigation, and all relevant departments and brother units worked together to carry out the investigation. The participating police officers moved to Dingxiang, Yuanping, Daixian, Taiyuan and other places. After three days and three nights of continuous fighting, the criminal suspect Xu Mouqiang, who was hiding in a hotel in Taiyuan City, was successfully captured at noon on May 4, 2023.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
According to the Russian Embassy in China, on May 8, the "Immortal Regiment" parade was held at the Russian Embassy in Beijing. About 700 people participated in the event, including about 100 Chinese citizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Wuhan Textile University conducted a "questionnaire survey on ideological status", some of the contents of which are speechless

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a university in Changsha, Hunan Province, launched a special training on "ideological security education". Analyze the new means by which the United States infiltrates China's ideology.
Among them (Figure 3), Ai Weiwei, Mao Yushi, Ren Zhiqiang, Zhou Shifeng, Red Star News, The Paper, Beijing News, and Upstream News are listed as typical examples of "extreme minorities".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Guangdong Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection issued a notice requiring civil servants to register their WeChat groups. In the attached "Self-examination form for purifying the circle of friends", seven types of negative speech are listed and required to be prohibited in the circle of friends. These include distorting, denying and attacking the history of the Party and the country; vilifying and smearing the leaders and heroes of the Party; advocating Western "constitutional democracy", "universal values" and human rights issues; questioning the achievements of building a moderately prosperous society in all respects and poverty alleviation, and distorting the new development pattern; spreading pessimistic arguments, using topics such as employment, housing, education, and justice to hype up the polarization of the rich and the poor, clamor for class solidification, and erode confidence and determination in development; interweaving foreign-related topics such as epidemic prevention cooperation with populism and narrow nationalism, causing group confrontation, public opinion confrontation, and attacks and smears on the effectiveness, safety, and fairness of China's new crown vaccine, etc., which impact the mainstream ideology.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Xi'an International Studies University announced that from the 7th to the 21st, all aircraft on campus will be banned from flying.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a netizen posted that he found three copies of "The Love Does Not Shake" on the bookshelf of the Songjiang District Library in Shanghai, saying that he was dumbfounded and felt that such a book that whitewashes drug dealers should not appear in the library.
It is understood that the book was criticized by Sichuan Drug Rehabilitation Center, saying that "literary creation must have a bottom line and heroes should not be bleed and then be disappointed."
On the 9th, the Songjiang District Library in Shanghai issued a statement saying that the problematic books had been removed from the shelves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
There is really no way to block all the robots in the comment section. If I block all the robots under one post, the next post will be full of new accounts. Even if I block them and can't see them myself, you can still see them.
What can I do?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I think it’s not just the tweets themselves, the comment section is also a place for discussion. Many people have already read a lot of news, but they still hope there is a place outside the firewall where they can exchange some real opinions.
But now the comment section is full of all kinds of meaningless content, advertising, robots, and howling, and the viewing experience is not as good as before. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @heruijie5 There are too many elements in the screenshot, I guess it's ok for him, but your account will have big problems
